hero.description: We provide strong, durable and reliable fabrication solutions for residential and commercial needs.

f1.title: Strong and Quality Work
f1.desc: We deliver robust ironworks like grills, gates, and sheds with durable build quality you can trust.

f2.title: Experienced Craftsmanship
f2.desc: Skilled craftsmen with years of experience deliver precise measurements and perfect finishing.

f3.title: On-time and Reliable Service
f3.desc: We complete projects on schedule with customer satisfaction as our primary goal.

footer.copyright: Trimurti Fabrication Inc. All Rights Reserved. ISO 9001:2015 Certified.
footer.description: We deliver grills, gates, sheds, railings, and custom fabrication with strong construction and precise finishing. Reliable service for residential, commercial, and industrial projects.

header.title: Our Services
header.subtitle: World-class manufacturing solutions tailored to your specifications.

0.title: Grill Fabrication
0.desc: Strong, safe, and attractive iron grills for homes, shops, and compounds.

1.title: Gate Fabrication
1.desc: Main gates, sliding gates, and iron doors built with precise measurements and durable construction.

2.title: Shed Fabrication
2.desc: Robust iron sheds for industrial, commercial, and household use.

3.title: Railing & Staircase
3.desc: Safe and beautiful railings for stairs, balconies, and terraces.

4.title: Custom Fabrication
4.desc: All kinds of custom iron fabrication tailored to customer needs.

5.title: Building Work
5.desc: Reliable building work and structural fabrication solutions.

cta.title: Have a Unique Requirement?
cta.subtitle: We thrive on complex engineering challenges. Contact our technical team today to discuss your custom project.
